soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.cfg

Class InfoflowCFG

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.solver.cfg.InfoflowCFG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    heros.InterproceduralCFG<soot.Unit,soot.SootMethod>, IInfoflowCFG, soot.jimple.toolkits.ide.icfg.BiDiInterproceduralCFG<soot.Unit,soot.SootMethod>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackwardsInfoflowCFG

    public class InfoflowCFG
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInfoflowCFG
    Interprocedural control-flow graph for the infoflow solver
    Author:
    Steven Arzt, Eric Bodden

      • getPostdominatorOf

        public IInfoflowCFG.UnitContainer getPostdominatorOf(soot.Unit u)
        Description copied from interface: IInfoflowCFG
        Gets the postdominator of the given unit. If this unit is a conditional, the postdominator is the join point behind both branches of the conditional.
        Specified by:
        getPostdominatorOf in interface IInfoflowCFG
        Parameters:
        u - The unit for which to get the postdominator.
        Returns:
        The postdominator of the given unit
